titles.title: Right-of-Way for American Drivers Act of 2015
To amend title 23, United States Code, to repeal the transportation alternatives program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
6/2/2015--Introduced. Right-of-Way for American Drivers Act of 2015
This bill repeals the transportation alternatives program. That program funds such projects as those for pedestrians and bicyclists, non-driver and disabled access to safe transportation, recreational trails and areas, land use in rights-of-way, and environmental mitigation (including protection of wildlife).
